About Me

Hi I am Athena Chien ,
Strong research professional with a demonstrated interest in signal processing and medical devices. Skilled in device design, Python, Matlab, and cell culture techniques. Pursuing PhD in Biomedical Engineering from Georgia Tech & Emory University.

  • Precision Biosystems Laboratory, Dr. Craig Forest
  • M.S. Electrical Engineering, Georgia Institute of Technology, expected Spring 2026
  • Current Research Interests: medical devices, sensing, electrophysiology
  • Research Experience: cellular-level therapy, chemical-level biomaterials, and robotics
  • Looking for: Summer 2025 internship in medtech to build on my sensing and signal processing skills

Undergraduate Student, Rice University

2017 — 2021
